headline: Prison stocks, Constellation Brands, casinos: Trending Tickers
summary: Prison stocks, including Geo Group (GEO) and CoreCivic (CXW), climb after Trump's big, beautiful bill became law. Jefferies analysts upgraded Constellation Brands (STZ) to Buy from Hold and raised its price target to $205, saying the sell-off went "too far." Goldman Sachs initiated coverage of MGM Resorts (MGM) with a Sell rating and $34 price target. The firm also reinstated coverage of Wynn Resorts (WYNN) with a Buy rating and $122 price target. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts here.

content.title: Prison stocks, Constellation Brands, casinos: Trending Tickers
content.description:
Prison stocks, including Geo Group (GEO) and CoreCivic (CXW), climb after Trump's big, beautiful bill became law.

Jefferies analysts upgraded Constellation Brands (STZ) to Buy from Hold and raised its price target to $205, saying the sell-off went "too far."

Goldman Sachs initiated coverage of MGM Resorts (MGM) with a Sell rating and $34 price target. The firm also reinstated coverage of Wynn Resorts (WYNN) with a Buy rating and $122 price target.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts here.
